mapper.sql: id , paybatchid, paymoneycode, paymoneytype, paymoneyobjectcode, paymoneyobjectid, paymoney, paytype, paymoneystatus, lendtype, paytime, verifystatus, verifytime, verifyer, verifyername, verifyremark, receivetime, receiver, receivername, month, createtime, bunitname, bunitbankaccount, bunitaccountbranchcode, bunitaccountbranchname, bankaccountname, bankaccount, bankaccountbranchcode, bankaccountbranchname, openbank, remark
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into budget_paymoney (paymoneycode, paymoneytype, paymoneyobjectcode, paymoneyobjectid, paymoney, paytype, paymoneystatus, createtime, bunitname, bunitbankaccount, bunitaccountbranchcode, bunitaccountbranchname, bankaccountname, bankaccount, bankaccountbranchcode, bankaccountbranchname, openbank, remark) values
( #{pm.paymoneycode}, #{pm.paymoneytype}, #{pm.paymoneyobjectcode}, #{pm.paymoneyobjectid}, #{pm.paymoney}, #{pm.paytype}, #{pm.paymoneystatus}, #{pm.createtime}, #{pm.bunitname}, #{pm.bunitbankaccount}, #{pm.bunitaccountbranchcode}, #{pm.bunitaccountbranchname}, #{pm.bankaccountname}, #{pm.bankaccount}, #{pm.bankaccountbranchcode}, #{pm.bankaccountbranchname}, #{pm.openbank}, #{pm.remark} )
mapper.select:
SELECT bp.*, pb.paybatchcode, DATE_FORMAT(bp.paytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') paytimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(bp.receivetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') receivetimeStr FROM budget_paymoney bp,budget_paybatch pb WHERE bp.verifystatus = -1 AND bp.id IN (${conditionMap.ids}) AND bp.paybatchid = pb.id
AND bp.paymoneycode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND bp.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND bp.bankaccountname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
${authSql}

SELECT _pay.*, _paybatch.paybatchcode, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.paytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') paytimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.receivetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') receivetimeStr FROM budget_paymoney _pay LEFT JOIN budget_paybatch _paybatch ON _paybatch.id = _pay.paybatchid WHERE _pay.paymoneytype != 2
AND _pay.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.paymoneycode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.bankaccountname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND _pay.bankaccountbranchname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.bunitname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _paybatch.paybatchcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.paymoneystatus = #{value}
AND _pay.paymoneytype = #{value}
AND _pay.paytype = #{value}
AND _pay.paymoneytype in (1,2)
AND _pay.paymoneytype = 3
ORDER BY _pay.paymoneystatus , _pay.receivetime desc , _pay.paymoneycode desc
${authSql}

SELECT _pay.*, _paybatch.paybatchcode, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.paytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') paytimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.receivetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') receivetimeStr FROM budget_paymoney _pay LEFT JOIN budget_paybatch _paybatch ON _paybatch.id = _pay.paybatchid WHERE _pay.paymoneystatus = 3 AND _pay.verifystatus = 0 AND _pay.paytype=1
AND _pay.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.paymoneycode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.bankaccountname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY _pay.receivetime desc , _pay.paymoneycode desc
${authSql}

SELECT ttt.* FROM ( SELECT reimcode,CONCAT(_order.reimcode,' (报销人:',_order.reimperonsname,', 报销金额:',ROUND(_order.reimmoney, 2),')') query,CONCAT(_order.reimcode,' (报销人:',_order.reimperonsname,', 报销金额:',_order.reimmoney,')') text,reimcode value FROM budget_reimbursementorder _order) ttt WHERE 1=1 AND ttt.reimcode IN (SELECT paymoneyobjectcode FROM budget_paymoney _pay WHERE _pay.paymoneytype=1 AND _pay.paymoneystatus = 1)
AND ttt.query LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%')
ORDER BY reimcode desc
${authSql}

SELECT DISTINCT _pay.paymoneyobjectcode tccode FROM budget_paymoney _pay WHERE _pay.paymoneytype = 2 AND _pay.paymoneystatus = 1
AND _pay.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%')
ORDER BY tccode DESC
${authSql}

SELECT ttt.* FROM( SELECT DISTINCT _pay.paymoneyobjectcode xmcode, CONCAT(_projectsum.projectname,'(',_projectsum.projectno,')') query FROM budget_paymoney _pay INNER JOIN budget_projectlendsum_new _projectsum ON _pay.paymoneyobjectcode = _projectsum.projectno WHERE _pay.paymoneytype=6 AND _pay.paymoneystatus = 1) ttt WHERE 1=1
AND ttt.query LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%')
ORDER BY xmcode DESC
${authSql}

SELECT _pay.*, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.paytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') paytimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.receivetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') receivetimeStr FROM budget_paymoney _pay WHERE _pay.paymoneystatus = 1 AND _pay.verifystatus = 0 AND _pay.paytype = #{paytype}
AND _pay.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{objectcode}, '%')
AND _pay.bankaccountname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bankaccountname}, '%')
AND _pay.id IN (${ids})
ORDER BY _pay.receivetime DESC

SELECT _pay.*, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.paytime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') paytimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(_pay.receivetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') receivetimeStr FROM budget_paymoney _pay WHERE _pay.paymoneystatus = 1 AND _pay.paytype = 1 and _pay.paymoneytype != 2 AND _pay.verifystatus = 0
AND _pay.id NOT IN (${value})
AND _pay.paymoneyobjectcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value} ,'%')
AND _pay.bankaccountname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND _pay.bankaccountbranchname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND _pay.bunitname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
AND _pay.paymoneytype = #{value}
AND _pay.paymoneytype in (1,2)
AND _pay.paymoneytype = 3
${authSql}
ORDER BY _pay.receivetime DESC
